name: Child of Yggdrasil
description: The Child of Yggdrasil is a Large aberration with a formidable presence, characterized by its chaotic and destructive nature. It has a high Wisdom score and notable stealth capabilities.
memorable: Its ability to destroy nonmagical objects and blend into forest terrain makes it a strategic and unpredictable opponent.
goals: Embodies the chaotic and destructive aspects of nature.
relations: May be found in the company of other aberrations or chaotic entities of nature.
environment: Typically found in forested areas, capitalizing on environmental camouflage.
strengths: High perception due to a high Wisdom score and abilities that enhance its stealth and battlefield control.
attacks: Utilizes Multiattack to make three claw attacks that deal slashing and acid damage.
most_powerful_ability: Acid Touch allows it to destroy a nonmagical object as an action, making it highly effective for manipulation in combat.
senses: Possesses keen senses with advantages on perception checks relying on smell.
skills: High perception skill proficiency enhances its tracking and awareness in the environment.
additional_information: Has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in forest terrain.
Capable of blending into surroundings to attack unexpectedly.
Strong physical presence with effective melee capabilities.
test_queries: stealthy forest monster with acid attacks
large aberration that excels in nature
formidable enemy with high perception skills
child of Yggdrasil abilities and tactics
